title: Ultimatum Warrior
author: verias
text:
So, at least William is trying to be considerate and practical, since yeah, it's not really his amulet to give.

Now that the gauntlet has been tossed, I guess William has to make his decision, quickly.

replies.author: cjack99*Guest*
replies.text: Looks to me there's gonna be some ass kickin......
